project_descr: To support the constitutional review process in civic education sensitising the public to the reforms being proposed, and a precursor to the public referendum which is needed to endorse any constitutional amendments.

outputs.output_descr: It is expected to contribute to significant improvements in the country’s governance, in particular by strengthening public understanding of the constitution, and issues around human rights, gender equality and public accountability.

document_name: Support to Referendum on Constitutional Reform in Grenad
